attention1.ptxt: All inspection and replacement are to be performed with ENGINE NOT RUNNING.

servinfosub.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear, cleanliness and tension. If any defect exists, adjust or replace.
For belt inspection, refer to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment .

servinfosub.title: Power Steering Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear, cleanliness and tension. If any defect exists, adjust or replace.
For inspection, refer to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment .
